short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring clear and in-context feedback using voice messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
vero.fm helps you add your voice on any screenshot.

It feels simpler. You may be in a rush to finish your week. Or you could be drowning under so many requests from colleagues, friends, anyone... Design feedback, project explanations, pitch deck reviews, code PRs, copywriting reviews, that's a lot. Get back to them using your voice, and it will be easier.

It complements writing. You just buckled that documentation piece. But you fear that it looks hard to get in. Add some audio messages to make it easier to navigate. And get that piece communicated for real.

It conveys nuances. Working with others also means expressing feedback or structuring complex intentions. Giving feedback can be touchy, and written messages can feel too harsh. Try with your voice.
